name: Protein-Packed Paratha Roll
ingredients: 1 cup whole wheat flour, 1/2 cup cooked chickpeas, 1 small onion (chopped), 1 small tomato (chopped), 1 green chili (chopped), 1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1/2 teaspoon cumin powder, 1/2 teaspoon coriander powder, salt to taste, 1 tablespoon oil, fresh coriander leaves (for garnish)
recipe: In a bowl, mix whole wheat flour with water and knead it into a soft dough. Let it rest for 15-20 minutes. Meanwhile, mash the cooked chickpeas in a bowl.Heat oil in a pan and saute chopped onion until translucent. Add chopped tomato and green chili to the pan and cook until tomatoes are soft. Add mashed chickpeas and spices (turmeric powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, salt) to the pan. Mix well and cook for another 2-3 minutes. Divide the dough into small balls and roll each ball into a thin paratha. Place a portion of the chickpea mixture in the center of each paratha and roll it up.Heat a flat pan or tawa and cook the rolled parathas on both sides until golden brown. Serve hot, garnished with fresh coriander  leaves.

name: Nutty Lentil Pancakes
ingredients: 1 cup split red lentils (masoor dal), 1 small onion (finely chopped), 2 green chilies (finely chopped), 1/4 cup chopped cilantro, 2 tablespoons chopped peanuts, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1/2 teaspoon cumin seeds, salt to taste, oil for cooking
recipe: Soak the split red lentils in water for 2-3 hours, then drain them. In a blender, grind the soaked lentils into a smooth batter. Transfer the lentil batter to a mixing bowl and add chopped onion, green chilies, cilantro, chopped peanuts, turmeric powder, cumin seeds, and salt. Mix well. Heat a non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat and lightly grease it with oil. Pour a ladleful of the lentil batter onto the skillet and spread it out into a thin pancake. Cook the pancake for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden brown and cooked through. Repeat with the remaining batter to make more pancakes. Serve hot with yogurt or your favorite chutney.

name: Chickpea Flour Omelette with Vegetables
ingredients: 1 cup chickpea flour (besan), 1/2 cup water, 1 small onion (finely chopped), 1 small tomato (finely chopped), 1/4 cup chopped spinach, 2 green chilies (finely chopped), 1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1/2 teaspoon cumin seeds, salt to taste, oil for cooking
recipe: In a mixing bowl, combine chickpea flour, water, turmeric powder, cumin seeds, and salt to make a smooth batter. Add chopped onion, tomato, spinach, and green chilies to the batter. Mix well. Heat a non-stick skillet or frying pan over medium heat and lightly grease it with oil. Pour a ladleful of the batter onto the skillet and spread it out into a thin omelette. Cook the omelette for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden brown and cooked through. Repeat with the remaining batter to make more omelettes. Serve hot with a side of yogurt or your favorite chutney.

name: Pakistani Omelette
ingredients: 3 eggs, 1 tomato (diced), 1 onion (finely chopped), 1 green chili (chopped), 1/4 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1/4 teaspoon red chili powder, Salt to taste, 1 tablespoon oil
recipe: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add chopped onions and green chilies. saute until onions are translucent. Add diced tomatoes and cook until they soften. In a bowl, beat the eggs with turmeric powder, red chili powder, and salt. Pour the beaten eggs over the cooked vegetables in the pan. Allow the omelette to cook until set on the bottom, then flip and cook the other side until done. Serve hot with bread or paratha.

name: Desi Egg Bhurji with Roti
ingredients: 4 eggs, 2 whole wheat rotis, 1 small onion (finely chopped), 1 small tomato (finely chopped), 2 green chilies (finely chopped), 1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1/2 teaspoon cumin seeds, salt to taste, 1 tablespoon oil
recipe: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add cumin seeds and let them splutter. Add chopped onion and saute until golden brown. Add chopped tomato and green chilies. Cook until tomatoes are soft. Crack the eggs into the pan and scramble them. Add turmeric powder and salt. Mix well. Cook until the eggs are fully cooked and scrambled. Warm the whole wheat rotis on a separate pan or tawa. Serve the egg bhurji with warm rotis. Optionally, garnish with fresh cilantro leaves  before  serving.

name: Spicy Egg Stuffed Bell Peppers
ingredients: 2 bell peppers, 4 eggs, 1 small onion (finely chopped), 1 small tomato (finely chopped), 2 cloves garlic (minced), 1/2 teaspoon chili powder, 1/2 teaspoon cumin powder, salt to taste, 1 tablespoon oil
recipe: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove the seeds and membranes. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add chopped onion and minced garlic. saute until onions are translucent. Add chopped tomato, chili powder, cumin powder, and salt. Cook until tomatoes are soft. Crack the eggs into the pan and scramble them with the onion-tomato mixture. Cook until the eggs are fully scrambled. Spoon the egg mixture into the bell peppers. Place the stuffed bell peppers on a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the peppers are tender. Serve hot as a delicious and nutritious  breakfast.

name: Egg and Spinach Breakfast Wrap
ingredients: 2 whole wheat tortillas, 4 eggs, 1 cup fresh spinach leaves, 1 small onion (finely chopped), 1/2 cup shredded cheese, salt and pepper to taste, 1 tablespoon oil
recipe: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add chopped onion and saute until translucent. Add fresh spinach leaves and cook until wilted. Crack the eggs into the skillet and scramble them with the spinach-onion mixture. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Warm the whole wheat tortillas in a separate skillet or microwave. Spoon the scrambled egg mixture onto the center of each tortilla. Sprinkle shredded cheese over the eggs. Roll up the tortillas to form wraps. Serve hot and enjoy a nutritious breakfast on the go.

name: Egg and Cheese Breakfast Muffins
ingredients: 6 eggs, 1/2 cup shredded cheese, 1/4 cup diced bell pepper, 1/4 cup diced onion, salt and pepper to taste, cooking spray
recipe: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and lightly grease a muffin tin with cooking spray. In a mixing bowl, beat the eggs until well combined. Stir in the shredded cheese, diced bell pepper, diced onion, salt, and pepper. Pour the egg mixture evenly into the muffin cups, filling each about 3/4 full. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the muffins are set and golden brown on top. Allow the muffins to cool for a few minutes before removing them from the muffin tin. Serve warm as a convenient and protein-rich breakfast  option.

name: Egg and Avocado Breakfast Toast
ingredients: 2 slices whole wheat bread, 2 eggs, 1 avocado (sliced), 1 small tomato (sliced), salt and pepper to taste, 1 tablespoon olive oil
recipe: Heat olive oil in a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Crack the eggs into the skillet and fry them to your desired doneness. Toast the whole wheat bread slices until golden brown. Place the toasted bread slices on a plate. Top each slice with sliced avocado and tomato. Carefully place a fried egg on top of each toast. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately as a delicious and satisfying breakfast.

name: Egg and Vegetable Breakfast Skillet
ingredients: 4 eggs, 1 small onion (finely chopped), 1 bell pepper (diced), 1 small zucchini (diced), 1 tomato (diced), 2 cloves garlic (minced), 1/2 teaspoon paprika, salt and pepper to taste, 1 tablespoon oil
recipe: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add chopped onion and minced garlic. saute until onions are soft and translucent. Add diced bell pepper and zucchini to the skillet. Cook until vegetables are tender. Add diced tomato and paprika. Cook for another 2-3 minutes. Crack the eggs into the skillet, evenly distributing them over the vegetable mixture. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Cover the skillet and cook until the eggs are set to your liking.

name: Egg and Vegetable Breakfast Hash
ingredients: 4 eggs, 1 cup diced potatoes, 1/2 cup diced bell peppers, 1/2 cup diced onions, 1/2 cup diced tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic (minced), 1/2 teaspoon paprika, salt and pepper to taste, 1 tablespoon olive oil
recipe: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add diced potatoes to the skillet and cook until golden brown and tender. Add diced bell peppers, onions, and minced garlic to the skillet. Cook until vegetables are soft. Add diced tomatoes and paprika. Cook for another 2-3 minutes. Create wells in the vegetable mixture and crack the eggs into each well. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Cover the skillet and cook until the eggs are set to your liking. Serve hot as a hearty and satisfying breakfast.

name: Egg and Spinach Breakfast Casserole
ingredients: 6 eggs, 2 cups fresh spinach leaves, 1 cup diced bell peppers, 1/2 cup diced onions, 1/2 cup shredded cheese, 1/2 cup milk, salt and pepper to taste, cooking spray
recipe: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C) and lightly grease a baking dish with cooking spray. In a mixing bowl, beat the eggs and milk until well combined. Stir in fresh spinach leaves, diced bell peppers, diced onions, shredded cheese, salt, and pepper. Pour the egg mixture into the prepared baking dish. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the casserole is set and golden brown on top. Allow the casserole to cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving. Serve warm as a nutritious and delicious breakfast option.

name: Egg and Mushroom Breakfast Quesadilla
ingredients: 2 whole wheat tortillas, 4 eggs, 1 cup sliced mushrooms, 1/2 cup diced onions, 1/2 cup shredded cheese, salt and pepper to taste, cooking spray
recipe: Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and lightly grease it with cooking spray. Crack the eggs into the skillet and scramble them until cooked through. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Remove the scrambled eggs from the skillet and set aside. In the same skillet, add sliced mushrooms and diced onions. Cook until mushrooms are golden brown and onions are translucent.

name: Egg and Potato Breakfast Tacos
ingredients: 4 small corn tortillas, 4 eggs, 1 cup diced potatoes, 1/2 cup diced onions, 1/2 cup diced bell peppers, 1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese, salt and pepper to taste, cooking spray
recipe: Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and lightly grease it with cooking spray. Add diced potatoes to the skillet and cook until golden brown and tender. Add diced onions and bell peppers to the skillet. Cook until vegetables are soft. Crack the eggs into the skillet and scramble them with the potato mixture until cooked through. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Warm the corn tortillas in a separate skillet or microwave. Divide the scrambled egg and potato mixture evenly between the tortillas. Sprinkle shredded cheddar cheese over the filling. Serve hot as delicious breakfast tacos, optionally with salsa or avocado slices.

name: Egg and Spinach Breakfast Muffins
ingredients: 6 eggs, 1 cup fresh spinach (chopped), 1/2 cup diced tomatoes, 1/4 cup diced onions, 1/4 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, salt and pepper to taste, cooking spray
recipe: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C) and lightly grease a muffin tin with cooking spray. In a mixing bowl, beat the eggs until well combined. Stir in chopped fresh spinach, diced tomatoes, diced onions, shredded mozzarella cheese, salt, and pepper. Pour the egg mixture evenly into the muffin cups, filling each about 3/4 full. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the muffins are set and golden brown on top. Allow the muffins to cool for a few minutes before removing them from the muffin tin. Serve warm as a convenient and protein-rich breakfast option.

name: Pakistani Egg and Potato Curry
ingredients: 4 eggs, 2 potatoes, peeled and diced, 1 onion, finely chopped, 2 tomatoes, chopped, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1-inch ginger, grated, 1 green chili, chopped, 1/2 teaspoon cumin seeds, 1/2 teaspoon coriander powder, 1/4 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1/4 teaspoon red chili powder, salt to taste, fresh coriander leaves for garnish, oil for cooking
recipe: Hard boil the eggs, peel, and set aside. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add cumin seeds and let them splutter. Add chopped onions and saute until golden brown. Add minced garlic, grated ginger, and chopped green chili. saute for another minute. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they turn mushy. Add diced potatoes, turmeric powder, coriander powder, red chili powder, and salt. Mix well. Add water as needed to cover the potatoes, cover the pan, and simmer until the potatoes are cooked through. Once the potatoes are tender, slice the boiled eggs in half and gently place them in the curry. Cook for another 2-3 minutes until the flavors meld together. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with rice or bread.

name: Pakistani Egg Paratha
ingredients: 2 eggs, 2 whole wheat parathas (store-bought or homemade), 1 onion, finely chopped, 1 tomato, finely chopped, 1 green chili, chopped, 1/4 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1/4 teaspoon red chili powder, salt to taste, fresh coriander leaves for garnish, oil for cooking
recipe: Heat a little oil in a pan over medium heat. Add chopped onions and green chili. saute until onions are translucent. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they soften. Break the eggs into the pan and scramble them with the vegetables. Season with turmeric powder, red chili powder, and salt. Mix well and cook until the eggs are fully cooked. Warm the parathas on another pan or griddle. Place the egg mixture in the center of each paratha, fold the edges to enclose the filling, and press gently to seal. Serve hot garnished with fresh coriander leaves.

name: Egg and Chicken Scramble
ingredients: 2 eggs, 200g chicken breast, diced, 1/2 onion, finely chopped, 1 tomato, chopped, 1/2 teaspoon garlic paste, 1/2 teaspoon ginger paste, 1/2 teaspoon cumin powder, 1/2 teaspoon coriander powder, 1/4 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1/4 teaspoon red chili powder, salt to taste, 1 tablespoon cooking oil, fresh coriander leaves, for garnish
recipe: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add chopped onions and saute until translucent. Add garlic paste and ginger paste. saute for a minute until fragrant. Add diced chicken breast and cook until no longer pink. Add chopped tomato and cook

name: Chicken and Egg Breakfast Wrap
ingredients: 2 whole wheat wraps, 2 chicken sausages (cooked and sliced), 4 eggs, 1/2 cup diced tomatoes, 1/4 cup diced onions, 1/4 cup shredded cheddar cheese, salt and pepper to taste
recipe: Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Crack the eggs into the skillet and scramble them until cooked through. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Warm the whole wheat wraps in a separate skillet or microwave. Divide the scrambled eggs evenly between the wraps. Place the sliced cooked chicken sausages on top of the eggs. Sprinkle diced tomatoes, onions, and shredded cheddar cheese over the wraps. Roll up the wraps and serve immediately as a delicious breakfast on the go.

name: Minced Meat and Egg Stir-fry
ingredients: 100g minced meat (chicken or beef), 2 eggs, 1 bell pepper, sliced, 1 onion, sliced, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 teaspoon sesame oil, cooked rice for serving, chopped green onions for garnish
recipe: Heat sesame oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add minced garlic and saute until fragrant. Add minced meat and cook until browned. Push the meat to one side of the pan and crack in the eggs. Scramble until cooked through. Add sliced bell pepper and onion to the pan. Stir-fry until vegetables are tender. Pour in soy sauce and mix everything together. Serve the stir-fry over cooked rice, garnished with chopped green onions.

name: Minced Chicken and Egg Breakfast Bowl
ingredients: 2 eggs, 1 cup cooked quinoa, 1/2 cup cooked minced chicken, 1/4 cup diced bell peppers, 1/4 cup diced onions, salt and pepper to taste
recipe: Cook the quinoa and minced chicken according to package instructions and set aside. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Crack the eggs into the skillet and cook them to your desired doneness. Season with salt and pepper to taste. In a bowl, layer cooked quinoa, cooked minced chicken, diced bell peppers, and diced onions. Place the cooked eggs on top of the bowl. Serve immediately as a nutritious and satisfying breakfast.

name: Chicken and Egg Breakfast Skillet
ingredients: 4 eggs, 1 cup cooked diced chicken, 1/2 cup diced potatoes, 1/4 cup diced onions, 1/4 cup diced bell peppers, salt and pepper to taste
recipe: Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Add diced potatoes to the skillet and cook until golden brown and tender. Add diced onions and bell peppers to the skillet. Cook until softened. Add cooked diced chicken to the skillet and heat through. Crack the eggs into the skillet and cook them to your desired doneness. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot directly from the skillet, as a hearty and satisfying breakfast option.

name: Egg and Chicken Breakfast Burrito
ingredients: 2 large flour tortillas, 4 eggs, 1 cup cooked shredded chicken, 1/2 cup diced tomatoes, 1/4 cup diced onions, 1/4 cup shredded cheddar cheese, salt and pepper to taste
recipe: Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Crack the eggs into the skillet and scramble them until cooked through. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Warm the flour tortillas in a separate skillet or microwave. Divide the scrambled eggs evenly between the tortillas. Place cooked shredded chicken on top of the eggs. Sprinkle diced tomatoes, onions, and shredded cheddar cheese over the chicken. Roll up the tortillas to form burritos, tucking in the sides as you roll. Serve hot and enjoy a hearty breakfast on the go.

name: Chicken and Vegetable Breakfast Frittata
ingredients: 4 eggs, 1 cup cooked diced chicken, 1/2 cup diced bell peppers, 1/2 cup diced onions, 1 cup spinach leaves, 1/4 cup shredded cheese, salt and pepper to taste
recipe: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). In a mixing bowl, beat the eggs until well combined. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and lightly grease it with cooking spray. Add diced bell peppers and onions to the skillet. Cook until softened. Add cooked diced chicken and spinach leaves to the skillet. Cook until spinach is wilted. Pour the beaten eggs into the skillet, covering the chicken and vegetables evenly. Cook for 3-4 minutes, until the edges start to set. Sprinkle shredded cheese over the frittata. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 10-12 minutes, until the eggs are fully set and the cheese is melted and bubbly. Slice into wedges and serve hot.

name: Chicken and Egg Breakfast Salad
ingredients: 2 eggs (hard-boiled and sliced), 1 cup cooked diced chicken, 2 cups mixed salad greens, 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes (halved), 1/4 cup sliced cucumbers, 1/4 cup sliced bell peppers, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinaigrette dressing
recipe: In a large bowl, combine mixed salad greens, cherry tomatoes, sliced cucumbers, and sliced bell peppers. Add cooked diced chicken and sliced hard-boiled eggs to the bowl. Drizzle balsamic vinaigrette dressing over the salad.

name: Chicken and Egg Breakfast Skillet with Sweet Potatoes
ingredients: 4 eggs, 1 cup cooked diced chicken, 1 cup diced sweet potatoes, 1/2 cup diced bell peppers, 1/4 cup diced onions, 2 cloves garlic (minced), salt and pepper to taste
recipe: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add diced sweet potatoes to the skillet and cook until tender. Add minced garlic, diced onions, and diced bell peppers to the skillet. Cook until vegetables are soft. Add cooked diced chicken to the skillet and heat through. Crack the eggs into the skillet and scramble them with the chicken and vegetables. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Cook until the eggs are fully cooked and scrambled. Serve hot as a hearty and nutritious breakfast.

name: Chicken Egg and Vegetable Breakfast Casserole
ingredients: 6 eggs, 1 cup cooked diced chicken, 1 cup diced potatoes, 1/2 cup diced bell peppers, 1/2 cup diced onions, 1 cup spinach leaves, 1/4 cup shredded cheese, salt and pepper to taste
recipe: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C) and lightly grease a baking dish. In a mixing bowl, beat the eggs until well combined. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Spread diced potatoes evenly in the bottom of the prepared baking dish. Layer cooked diced chicken, diced bell peppers, diced onions, and spinach leaves over the potatoes. Pour the beaten eggs over the layered ingredients. Sprinkle shredded cheese on top. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes or until the eggs are set and the top is golden brown. Serve hot as a delicious breakfast casserole.

name: Chicken and Vegetable Omelette
ingredients: 2 eggs, 100g cooked chicken breast, diced, 1/2 cup mixed vegetables (spinach, mushrooms, onions, etc.), chopped, 1/4 cup shredded cheese, Salt and pepper to taste, 1 tablespoon butter or oil
recipe: Heat butter or oil in a non-stick skillet over medium heat. In a bowl, beat the eggs with salt and pepper. Pour the beaten eggs into the skillet and tilt to spread them evenly. Once the edges begin to set, sprinkle diced chicken breast and mixed vegetables evenly over one half of the omelette. Sprinkle shredded cheese over the filling. Carefully fold the other half of the omelette over the filling. Cook for another minute until the cheese melts and the omelette is cooked through. Slide the omelette onto a plate and serve hot.

name: Chicken and Egg Seekh Kabab Platter
ingredients: 2 boiled eggs, 2 pieces Chicken Seekh Kababs, 1 whole wheat paratha, 1/2 cup seasoned yogurt, cucumber slices, tomato slices
recipe: Grill or pan-fry the chicken seekh kababs until cooked through. Serve with boiled eggs, cucumber slices, tomato slices, and whole wheat paratha. Enjoy with a side of seasoned yogurt.

name: Chicken Kabab Stuffed Omelet
ingredients: 1 Chicken Kabab, 2 eggs, 1 small onion, 1 green chili, 1 tbsp fresh coriander, 1 tbsp ghee or oil
recipe: Beat eggs and season with salt and pepper. Heat ghee/oil in a pan, add chopped onion, green chili, and chicken kabab. Pour beaten eggs over the mixture and cook until set. Fold the omelet and serve hot.

name: Chicken Kabab and Egg Salad
ingredients: 2 sliced Chicken Kababs, 2 hard-boiled eggs, mixed salad greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber slices, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp lemon juice, salt, and pepper
recipe: Arrange salad greens, sliced chicken kababs, hard-boiled eggs, cherry tomatoes, and cucumber on a plate. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper, toss gently, and serve.

name: Chicken Kabab Breakfast Wrap
ingredients: 2 chopped Chicken Kababs, 2 whole wheat tortillas, 2 scrambled eggs, shredded lettuce, sliced onion, sliced bell peppers, yogurt or tahini sauce
recipe: Warm the whole wheat tortilla. Layer with scrambled eggs, chopped chicken kababs, shredded lettuce, onion, and bell peppers. Drizzle with yogurt or tahini sauce. Roll up and enjoy as a wrap.

name: Cheese and Chicken Omelette Roll
ingredients: 2 eggs, 1/4 cup shredded cooked chicken, 2 tbsp shredded cheddar cheese, 1 tbsp chopped onion, 1 tbsp chopped bell peppers, 1 tsp butter or oil, 1 whole wheat roti or paratha
recipe: Beat eggs in a bowl and season with salt and pepper. Heat butter or oil in a pan, add onions and bell peppers, saute until softened. Pour beaten eggs over the vegetables in the pan. Sprinkle shredded chicken and cheddar cheese over the omelette. Roll up the omelette and serve with whole wheat roti or paratha.

name: Chicken and Cheese Stuffed Paratha
ingredients: 2 whole wheat parathas, 1/2 cup shredded cooked chicken, 1/4 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 tbsp chopped green chilies, 1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander, Ghee or butter for frying
recipe: Mix shredded chicken, mozzarella cheese, green chilies, and fresh coriander in a bowl. Place the filling on one half of a paratha, fold over to cover the filling, press lightly. Heat ghee or butter in a pan, fry the stuffed paratha until golden and crispy on both sides. Serve hot with yogurt or raita.

name: Chicken and Cheese Breakfast Sandwich
ingredients: 2 whole grain bread slices, 1/4 cup shredded cooked chicken, 1 slice cheddar cheese, 2 slices tomato, fresh lettuce leaves, Butter for spreading
recipe: Toast the bread slices lightly. Spread butter on one side of each bread slice. Layer one slice of bread with shredded chicken, cheddar cheese, tomato slices, and lettuce. Top with the other bread slice, buttered side facing out. Grill the sandwich until the cheese melts and bread is golden.

name: Cheesy Chicken Scramble
ingredients: 3 eggs, 1/2 cup shredded cooked chicken, 1/4 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 2 tbsp chopped green onions, Salt and pepper to taste, 2 slices whole wheat toast
recipe: Beat eggs in a bowl, season with salt and pepper. Heat a non-stick pan, add eggs and scramble. When eggs are nearly cooked, add shredded chicken, cheddar cheese, and green onions. Continue cooking until cheese melts and mixture is heated through. Serve hot with whole wheat toast.

name: Spicy Egg Salad Sandwich
ingredients: 2 boiled eggs, 2 tbsp Greek yogurt, 1-2 green chilies, 1 tbsp red onion, 1 tbsp fresh coriander, 2 slices whole grain bread, Butter or spread of choice
recipe: In a bowl, mix chopped boiled eggs, Greek yogurt, green chilies, red onion, and fresh coriander. Spread butter or your favorite spread on bread slices. Spoon the egg salad mixture onto one slice of bread. Top with the other bread slice to make a sandwich. Serve with a side of sliced cucumber or tomatoes.

name: Egg and Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: 2 boiled eggs, 1 slice cheddar cheese, 2 slices whole wheat bread, Butter or spread of choice, Sliced tomatoes and lettuce leaves
recipe: Spread butter on one side of each bread slice. Place sliced boiled eggs on one bread slice. Top with cheddar cheese, sliced tomatoes, and lettuce. Cover with the other bread slice to make a sandwich. Toast the sandwich in a sandwich maker or on a pan until golden.

name: Egg and Avocado Sandwich
ingredients: 2 boiled eggs, 1/2 ripe avocado, 1 tsp lemon juice, Salt and black pepper to taste, 2 slices whole grain bread, Butter or spread of choice
recipe: In a bowl, mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and black pepper. Spread butter on one side of each bread slice. Spread mashed avocado on one bread slice. Arrange sliced boiled eggs on top of the avocado. Cover with the other bread slice to make a sandwich. Serve with a side of mixed greens or fruit.

name: Egg and Hummus Sandwich
ingredients: 2 boiled eggs, 2 tbsp hummus, Whole grain pita bread or sandwich bread, Sliced cucumber and bell peppers, Olive oil for drizzling
recipe: Spread hummus inside a pita bread or on sandwich bread. Layer sliced boiled eggs, cucumber, and bell peppers inside. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Serve with a side of yogurt or fresh fruit.

name: Chicken and Egg Salad Sandwich
ingredients: 2 boiled eggs, 1/2 cup cooked shredded chicken breast, 2 tbsp Greek yogurt, 1 tbsp finely chopped red onion, 1-2 finely chopped green chilies, 1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander, 2 slices whole grain bread, Butter or spread of choice
recipe: In a bowl, combine chopped boiled eggs, shredded chicken, Greek yogurt, red onion, green chilies, and fresh coriander. Spread butter on one side of each bread slice. Spread the chicken and egg mixture onto one bread slice. Top with the other bread slice to make a sandwich. Serve with a side of sliced cucumber or tomato.

name: Chicken and Egg Wrap
ingredients: 2 boiled eggs, 1/2 cup cooked shredded chicken breast, Whole wheat wrap or roti, 2 tbsp Greek yogurt, Sliced cucumber and lettuce leaves
recipe: Lay the whole wheat wrap on a clean surface. Spread Greek yogurt over the wrap. Arrange sliced boiled eggs, shredded chicken, cucumber, and lettuce leaves over the yogurt. Roll up the wrap tightly. Cut in half and serve.

name: Chicken and Egg Breakfast Burrito
ingredients: 2 boiled eggs, 1/2 cup cooked shredded chicken breast, Whole wheat tortilla, Salsa or chopped tomatoes, Avocado slices, Shredded cheese (optional)
recipe: Warm the whole wheat tortilla. Spread salsa or chopped tomatoes over the tortilla. Layer with chopped boiled eggs, shredded chicken, avocado slices, and shredded cheese if using. Roll up the tortilla into a burrito. Serve with a side of Greek yogurt or a green salad.

name: Chicken and Egg Open-Faced Sandwich
ingredients: 2 boiled eggs, 1/2 cup cooked shredded chicken breast, 2 slices whole grain bread, Hummus or Greek yogurt spread, Sliced cucumber and tomato
recipe: Toast the whole grain bread slices. Spread hummus or Greek yogurt on the toasted bread slices. Arrange sliced boiled eggs and shredded chicken over the spread. Top with sliced cucumber and tomato. Serve open-faced.

name: Savory Chicken and Oats Porridge
ingredients: 1/2 cup cooked shredded chicken breast, 1/2 cup rolled oats, 1 cup chicken or vegetable broth, 2 tbsp chopped mixed nuts (almonds, cashews), 1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander, Salt and black pepper to taste
recipe: In a saucepan, bring chicken or vegetable broth to a simmer. Add rolled oats and cook according to package instructions. Stir in shredded chicken, chopped nuts, fresh coriander, salt, and black pepper. Cook for a few more minutes until everything is heated through. Serve hot as a savory porridge.

name: Chicken and Nut Salad
ingredients: 1/2 cup cooked shredded chicken breast, Mixed salad greens, 2 tbsp chopped mixed nuts (walnuts, pecans), Cherry tomatoes, halved, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp lemon juice, Salt and pepper to taste
recipe: In a bowl, combine mixed salad greens, shredded chicken, chopped nuts, and cherry tomatoes. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper, toss gently to combine. Serve as a refreshing salad.

name: Chicken and Oats Breakfast Wrap
ingredients: 1/2 cup cooked shredded chicken breast, 1/4 cup cooked rolled oats, Whole wheat wrap or roti, Greek yogurt or hummus spread, Sliced cucumber and bell peppers
recipe: Lay the whole wheat wrap on a clean surface. Spread Greek yogurt or hummus over the wrap. Layer with cooked rolled oats and shredded chicken. Add sliced cucumber and bell peppers. Roll up the wrap tightly. Cut in half and serve.

name: Chicken Oats and Nut Breakfast Bowl
ingredients: 1/2 cup cooked shredded chicken breast, 1/2 cup cooked rolled oats, 2 tbsp chopped mixed nuts (almonds, pistachios), 2 tbsp dried fruits (raisins, apricots), 1 tbsp honey or maple syrup, 1/2 cup plain yogurt
recipe: In a bowl, combine cooked rolled oats, shredded chicken, chopped nuts, dried fruits, and honey or maple syrup. Serve with a dollop of plain yogurt on top. Mix everything together before eating.

name: Chicken Paratha Roll with Protein Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup cooked shredded chicken breast, 1 whole wheat paratha, Sliced onions and green chilies, 1/4 cup Greek yogurt
recipe: In a skillet, heat the whole wheat paratha. Layer with cooked shredded chicken, sliced onions, and green chilies. Spread Greek yogurt over the filling. Roll up the paratha and serve with a protein smoothie.

name: Chicken Omelette with Protein Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup cooked shredded chicken breast, 2 eggs, Chopped onions, tomatoes, and green chilies, Olive oil or butter
recipe: In a pan, heat olive oil or butter. saute chopped onions, tomatoes, and green chilies until softened. Beat eggs and pour into the pan. Add cooked shredded chicken to the omelette. Cook until eggs are set, then fold over. Serve with a protein smoothie.

name: Chicken Salad with Protein Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup cooked shredded chicken breast, Mixed salad greens, Cherry tomatoes and cucumber slices, Olive oil and lemon juice
recipe: Arrange mixed salad greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber slices, and cooked shredded chicken on a plate. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Serve with a protein smoothie.

name: Chicken Stuffed Paratha with Protein Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup cooked shredded chicken breast, 2 whole wheat parathas, Chopped onions and green chilies, 1/4 cup Greek yogurt
recipe: Stuff whole wheat parathas with cooked shredded chicken, chopped onions, and green chilies. Serve with a side of Greek yogurt. Enjoy with a protein smoothie.

name: Grilled Chicken and Egg Sandwich with Banana-Peanut Butter Smoothie
ingredients: 100g grilled chicken breast, 2 eggs, 2 whole wheat bread slices, Butter or spread of choice, Sliced tomato and lettuce, 1 Banana, 1 tablespoon Peanut butter, 1 cup Almond milk or water
recipe: Cook the grilled chicken breast and slice it thinly. Fry or scramble the eggs. Toast the whole wheat bread slices. Spread butter on one side of each bread slice. Layer the sliced grilled chicken, eggs, sliced tomato, and lettuce between the bread slices. Cut into halves to make sandwiches. Blend banana, peanut butter, and almond milk (or water) to make a smoothie. Serve the sandwich with the banana-peanut butter smoothie.

name: Grilled Chicken and Egg Wrap with Berry Spinach Smoothie
ingredients: 100g grilled chicken breast, 2 eggs, 1 whole wheat wrap or roti, Greek yogurt or hummus, 1 cup Spinach leaves, 1 cup Mixed berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries), 1 cup Water or coconut water
recipe: Slice the grilled chicken breast. Scramble or fry the eggs. Warm the whole wheat wrap or roti. Spread Greek yogurt or hummus on the wrap. Layer the sliced grilled chicken and eggs on one side of the wrap. Add spinach leaves. Roll up to form a wrap. Blend mixed berries, spinach, and water (or coconut water) to make a smoothie. Serve the wrap with the berry spinach smoothie.

name: Grilled Chicken and Egg Bagel Sandwich with Tropical Smoothie
ingredients: 100g grilled chicken breast, 2 eggs, 1 whole wheat bagel, Cream cheese or Greek yogurt, Sliced cucumber and red onion, 1 Mango, 1/2 cup Pineapple chunks, 1 cup Coconut water or water
recipe: Cook the grilled chicken breast and slice it thinly. Boil or fry the eggs. Toast the whole wheat bagel. Spread cream cheese or Greek yogurt on the bagel halves. Layer the sliced grilled chicken, eggs, sliced cucumber, and red onion between the bagel halves. Cut into halves to make sandwiches. Blend mango, pineapple, and coconut water (or water) to make a tropical smoothie. Serve the sandwich with the tropical smoothie.

name: Grilled Chicken and Egg Breakfast Burrito with Green Spinach Smoothie
ingredients: 100g grilled chicken breast, 2 eggs, 1 whole wheat tortilla, Salsa or chopped tomatoes, 1 cup Spinach leaves, Avocado slices, Green bell pepper slices, 1 cup Water or coconut water
recipe: Slice the grilled chicken breast. Scramble or fry the eggs. Warm the whole wheat tortilla. Spread salsa or chopped tomatoes on the tortilla. Layer the sliced grilled chicken, eggs, spinach leaves, avocado slices, and green bell pepper slices on one side of the tortilla. Roll up to form a burrito. Blend spinach and water (or coconut water) to make a green smoothie. Serve the breakfast burrito with the green spinach smoothie.

name: Grilled Chicken and Egg Panini with Peach Yogurt Smoothie
ingredients: 100g grilled chicken breast, 2 eggs, 2 whole grain panini bread slices, Olive oil or butter, Sliced cheddar cheese, 1 Peach, 1/2 cup Greek yogurt, 1 cup Almond milk or water
recipe: Cook the grilled chicken breast and slice it thinly. Fry or scramble the eggs. Brush olive oil or butter on the outside of the panini bread slices. Layer the sliced grilled chicken, eggs, and cheddar cheese between the bread slices. Grill the panini until golden and crispy. Blend peach, Greek yogurt, and almond milk (or water) to make a peach yogurt smoothie. Serve the grilled chicken and egg panini with the peach yogurt smoothie.

name: Grilled Kabab and Egg Sandwich with Cheese
ingredients: 1 piece Grilled chicken or beef kabab, 2 Eggs, 2 Whole wheat bread slices, Butter or spread of choice, Sliced cheese (cheddar or mozzarella), Sliced tomatoes and lettuce
recipe: Cook the grilled chicken or beef kabab as per instructions and slice it thinly. Scramble or fry the eggs. Toast the whole wheat bread slices. Spread butter on one side of each bread slice. Layer the sliced grilled kabab, eggs, sliced cheese, sliced tomatoes, and lettuce between the bread slices. Cut into halves to make sandwiches. Serve with a side of fresh fruit or a smoothie.

name: Grilled Kabab and Egg Wrap with Cheese
ingredients: 1 piece Grilled chicken or beef kabab, 2 Eggs, 1 Whole wheat wrap or roti, Greek yogurt or hummus, Sliced cheese (cheddar or mozzarella), Sliced onions and bell peppers
recipe: Slice the grilled chicken or beef kabab. Scramble or fry the eggs in a pan. Warm the whole wheat wrap or roti. Spread Greek yogurt or hummus on the wrap. Layer the sliced grilled kabab, eggs, sliced cheese, sliced onions, and bell peppers on one side of the wrap. Roll up to form a wrap. Serve with a side of yogurt or a small salad.

name: Grilled Kabab and Egg Panini with Cheese
ingredients: 1 piece Grilled chicken or beef kabab, 2 Eggs, 2 Whole grain panini bread slices, Olive oil or butter, Sliced cheese (cheddar or mozzarella), Sliced onions and mushrooms
recipe: Slice the grilled chicken or beef kabab. Scramble or fry the eggs. Brush olive oil or butter on the outside of the panini bread slices. Layer the sliced grilled kabab, eggs, sliced cheese, sliced onions, and mushrooms between the bread slices. Grill the panini until golden and crispy. Serve with a side of mixed greens or a light soup.

name: Grilled Kabab and Egg Bagel Sandwich with Cheese
ingredients: 1 piece Grilled chicken or beef kabab, 2 Eggs, 1 Whole wheat bagel, Cream cheese or Greek yogurt, Sliced cheese (cheddar or mozzarella), Sliced cucumbers and sprouts
recipe: Cook the grilled chicken or beef kabab and slice it thinly. Scramble or fry the eggs. Toast the whole wheat bagel. Spread cream cheese or Greek yogurt on the bagel halves. Layer the sliced grilled kabab, eggs, sliced cheese, sliced cucumbers, and sprouts between the bagel halves. Serve with a side of fresh fruit or a small salad.

name: Grilled Kabab and Egg Breakfast Burrito with Cheese
ingredients: 1 piece Grilled chicken or beef kabab, 2 Eggs, 1 Whole wheat tortilla, Salsa or chopped tomatoes, Shredded cheese (cheddar or mozzarella), Sliced avocado and cilantro
recipe: Slice the grilled chicken or beef kabab. Scramble or fry the eggs in a pan. Warm the whole wheat tortilla. Spread salsa or chopped tomatoes on the tortilla. Layer the sliced grilled kabab, eggs, shredded cheese, sliced avocado, and cilantro on one side of the tortilla. Roll up to form a burrito. Serve with a side of Greek yogurt or a fruit smoothie.

name: Grilled Chicken Egg and Potato Paratha Roll
ingredients: 100g Grilled chicken breast, 2 Eggs, 1 medium Potato, Whole wheat paratha or roti, Sliced onions, green chilies, and cilantro, Greek yogurt or mint chutney
recipe: Warm the whole wheat paratha or roti. Layer the sliced grilled chicken, scrambled or fried eggs, boiled and sliced potatoes, sliced onions, green chilies, and cilantro on one side of the paratha. Roll up to form a paratha roll. Serve with a side of Greek yogurt or mint chutney.

name: Grilled Chicken Egg and Potato Breakfast Bowl
ingredients: 100g Grilled chicken breast, 2 Eggs, 1 medium Potato, Sliced tomatoes and cucumber, Fresh greens (lettuce, spinach), Olive oil and lemon juice dressing
recipe: Arrange sliced grilled chicken, boiled or scrambled eggs, boiled and cubed potatoes, sliced tomatoes, cucumber, and fresh greens in a bowl. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice for dressing. Serve as a hearty breakfast bowl.

name: Grilled Chicken Egg and Potato Sandwich
ingredients: 100g Grilled chicken breast, 2 Eggs, 1 medium Potato, 2 Whole grain bread slices, Butter or spread of choice, Sliced cheese (optional), Sliced onions and tomatoes
recipe: Toast the whole grain bread slices. Spread butter on one side of each bread slice. Layer sliced grilled chicken, scrambled or fried eggs, boiled and sliced potatoes, sliced cheese (optional), sliced onions, and tomatoes between the bread slices. Cut into halves to make sandwiches. Serve with a side of fresh fruit or a small salad.

name: Grilled Chicken Egg and Potato Breakfast Wrap
ingredients: 100g Grilled chicken breast, 2 Eggs, 1 medium Potato, 1 Whole wheat wrap or roti, Sliced cheese (optional), Sliced bell peppers and jalapeÃƒÂ±os
recipe: Warm the whole wheat wrap or roti. Layer sliced grilled chicken, scrambled or fried eggs, boiled and sliced potatoes, sliced cheese (optional), sliced bell peppers, and jalapeÃƒÂ±os on one side of the wrap. Roll up to form a breakfast wrap. Serve with a side of salsa or Greek yogurt.

name: Grilled Chicken Egg and Potato Breakfast Platter
ingredients: 100g Grilled chicken breast, 2 Eggs, 1 medium Potato, Sliced cucumbers, carrots, and radishes, 2 Whole wheat toast slices, Hummus or Greek yogurt dip
recipe: Arrange sliced grilled chicken, boiled or scrambled eggs, boiled and sliced potatoes, sliced cucumbers, carrots, and radishes on a platter. Serve with whole wheat toast and a side of hummus or Greek yogurt dip.

name: Grilled Chicken Egg and Potato Breakfast Hash
ingredients: 100g Grilled chicken breast, 2 Eggs, 2 medium Potatoes, 1 small Onion, 1/2 cup Bell peppers (any color), Olive oil or butter, Salt, pepper, and paprika to taste
recipe: Heat olive oil or butter in a skillet over medium heat. Add chopped onion and bell peppers, saute until softened. Add diced grilled chicken and boiled potatoes to the skillet, season with salt, pepper, and paprika. Cook until everything is heated through and slightly crispy. Serve topped with fried or scrambled eggs.

name: Grilled Chicken Egg and Potato Breakfast Burrito Bowl
ingredients: 100g Grilled chicken breast, 2 Eggs, 1 medium Potato, 1/2 cup Black beans (cooked), 1/4 cup Salsa, 1/2 Avocado, Fresh cilantro, Lime wedges
recipe: Divide sliced grilled chicken, scrambled or fried eggs, boiled and diced potatoes, black beans, salsa, and avocado into bowls. Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with lime wedges on the side. Optional: Serve with warm tortillas or naan bread.

name: Grilled Chicken Egg and Potato Stuffed Paratha
ingredients: 100g Grilled chicken breast, 2 Eggs, 1 medium Potato, Whole wheat paratha dough, Garam masala, cumin powder, salt to taste, Ghee or oil for cooking
recipe: Mix shredded grilled chicken, scrambled eggs, mashed potatoes, garam masala, cumin powder, and salt in a bowl. Divide the paratha dough into balls and roll out into circles. Place a spoonful of the chicken-potato mixture in the center of each dough circle. Fold the dough over the filling to form a stuffed paratha. Cook on a hot griddle with ghee or oil until golden and cooked through. Serve hot with yogurt or chutney.

name: Grilled Chicken Egg and Potato Breakfast Salad
ingredients: 100g Grilled chicken breast, 2 Eggs, 1 medium Potato, Mixed salad greens, Cherry tomatoes, Cucumber, Red onion, Lemon-tahini dressing
recipe: Arrange mixed salad greens, sliced grilled chicken, boiled eggs, boiled potatoes, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion in a bowl. Drizzle with lemon-tahini dressing or dressing of choice. Toss gently to combine and serve.

name: Grilled Chicken Egg and Potato Breakfast Skillet
ingredients: 100g Grilled chicken breast, 2 Eggs, 1 medium Potato, 1 Red bell pepper, Green onions, Shredded cheese (cheddar or mozzarella), Olive oil or butter, Salt, pepper, and smoked paprika to taste
recipe: Heat olive oil or butter in a skillet over medium heat. Add diced potatoes and cook until lightly browned and crispy. Add diced grilled chicken, red bell pepper, and green onions to the skillet, season with salt, pepper, and smoked paprika. Create wells in the skillet and crack eggs into them. Cover and cook until eggs are cooked to your liking. Sprinkle with shredded cheese and serve hot.
